title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space

Make mouthwatering jerky, crunchy fruit chips, and garden-fresh dried herbs with the COSORI Food Dehydrator. Designed in California, this powerful, quiet, and easy-to-use dehydrator delivers consistent results across a large stainless steel drying area—perfect for meal prep, healthy snacks, and preserving seasonal produce.

Key features
- Large drying space: 6 stainless steel trays (12 x 13 in each) provide up to 6.48 ft² of dehydrating area to process more food in fewer batches.
- Even, efficient drying: A rear-mounted fan circulates hot air evenly for uniform results without rotating trays.
- Powerful performance: 600W of power with a wide 95°–165°F temperature range (35°–73°C) and up to 48-hour timer for precise control.
- Quiet operation: Runs at under 48 dB—about the sound of a quiet library—so it won’t disrupt your home.
- Intuitive controls: Digital touch-control LED display with memory function to quickly repeat your favorite settings.
- See your progress: Clear glass door lets you monitor drying without opening and losing heat.
- Built-in safety: Auto shutoff and overheat protection for peace of mind during long dehydrating cycles.
- Easy cleanup: Food-grade stainless steel trays are dishwasher safe.
- Designed for your kitchen: Sleek, modern look with durable materials, made for reliable everyday use.
- Region-ready: 120V, 60Hz for use in the USA and Canada.

What you can make
- Beef, turkey, and fish jerky
- Dried fruits and vegetables
- Fruit leathers and roll-ups
- Herbs, spices, and garnishes
- Crunchy yogurt bites and healthy pet treats

Included in the box
- COSORI Food Dehydrator (600W, 120V)
- 6 stainless steel trays (12 x 13 in each)
- 1 mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 in) for small or delicate items like herbs
- 1 fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 in) for purées and leathers
- Recipe book with 50 chef-crafted recipes

Specs at a glance
- Temperature range: 95°–165°F (35°–73°C)
- Timer: Up to 48 hours (set in 30-minute increments)
- Airflow: Rear fan hot air circulation
- Noise: <48 dB
- Door: Glass
- Controls: Digital touch-control LED with memory function
- Safety: Auto shutoff, overheat protection
- Trays: 6 stainless steel, dishwasher safe
- Capacity: Up to 6.48 ft² of drying space
- Voltage/Frequency: 120V, 60Hz (USA/Canada)

Why you’ll love it
- Consistent, even drying without guesswork
- Large capacity with a compact footprint
- Simple controls and easy cleanup
- Extends shelf life and reduces food waste
- Comes with accessories and recipes to get started fast

Create better snacks at home—healthier, tastier, and tailored to your preferences—with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky.
